net.munki.irc.control

Class ControlService

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.munki.irc.control.ControlService

  • public class ControlService
extends java.lang.Object
    A control service running on a socket, which can be used to pass commands to the bot. E.g QUIT.
    Author:
    Warren Milburn

      • serve

        public void serve(java.io.InputStream i,
         java.io.OutputStream o)
        Delivers the service to any connected clients.
        Parameters:
        i - The input stream on which to accept commands.
        o - The output stream on which to reply to the client.

      • setOutput

      • addServiceListener

        public void addServiceListener(ServiceListenerInterface serviceListenerInterface)
        Adds a service listener, which is notified of messages arriving on the socket.
        Parameters:
        serviceListenerInterface - Any service listener that wishes to be notified of messages on the socket.
